name: Espoo
note_english: full time students exempted  (one has to show student card) – the decision by City Board on 8.8.2011, not clear what was the policy before that decision.

name: Vantaa
note_english: No copayment for GP visits in school and student healtcare, but I am not sure whether this applied to visits done at health stations

name: Turku
note_english: full time students exempted  (one has to show student card) since 2004 (Social services and healtcare committee, 15.9.2004)

name: Kuopio
note_nurse: Change already in 2016, but exact date is unknown

note_english: a new joint municipal authority started in 2019 (Kymsote), and I have no information on municipal policies before the joint municipal authority
